user.title: Somfy PoE Motor Setup
user.description: Choose how you want to set up your Somfy PoE motors.

discovery.title: Select Motor
discovery.description: Found {count} motor(s). Select the motor you want to add.

discovery_failed.title: No Motors Found
discovery_failed.description:
Auto-discovery didn't find any Somfy PoE motors on your network. This could be because:

• Motors are on a different network/VLAN
• Multicast/mDNS is blocked by your router
• Motors are not powered on

Would you like to configure manually instead?

manual.title: Manual Configuration
manual.description: Enter the IP address and PIN code for your Somfy PoE motor. The PIN is printed on the motor label.

auth.title: Enter PIN Code
auth.description: Enter the 4-digit PIN code for {motor_name} at {ip_address}. The PIN is printed on the motor label.

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to the motor. Check the IP address and ensure the motor is powered and accessible on your network.
error.invalid_auth: Authentication failed. Check that the PIN code is correct.

abort.no_devices_found: No Somfy PoE motors found on the network. Ensure motors are powered and connected to the same network.

wink.name: Wink
wink.description: Make the motor jog briefly to identify which physical motor this is.
